alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Chouteau; Eastern Teton (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:44PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Teton, southwestern Chouteau and northeastern Cascade Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong gust front associated with thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Power to 13 miles northeast of Black Eagle to near Highwood. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Fort Benton, The Knees, Black Eagle, Highwood, Carter, Floweree, Loma, Portage, Vaughn and Malmstrom Afb. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 284 and 294. Highway 87 between mile markers 4 and 60. Highway 89 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central and north central Montana.
